projects.name: Flocking Simulator
projects.description: Interactive web-based application that demonstrates the emergent behavior of flocking, inspired by Craig Reynolds' Boids algorithm

responsibilities: Contributed to a multi-year digital transformation project for a leading UK gambling company.
Extracted database calls from legacy monolithic applications and migrated them to a microservices architecture.
Contributed to the migration of legacy stored procedures powering SSRS reports to GCP BigQuery.
Worked on intranet asp net core web app and powering it .net modules.
Triaged and troubleshooted issues reported by customers.
Developed various scale web applications written in React, Asp Net Web Forms, Asp Net Core and ZURB Foundation
Maintained existing web applications and applied new functionalities to them.
Created and modified email templates which targeted most email clients.
Developed Tableau visualizations and dashboards using Tableau Desktop.
Designed and implemented software in C# 4.5 with Visual Studio 2015 and later.
Worked alongside Paperless BPM software development team.
Contributed software engineering expertise in the development of products through the software lifecycle.
